name: .WOP File Extension
summary: Learn about .WOP files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Object preset file for Wonderland Adventures Editor, a program used to create and edit levels for Wonderland Adventures; a hex file that contains 3D models, character movements, logic data, level parameters, and other data.

content: WOP files can be edited to make additional object presets. They are used to create objects for custom adventures in the editor.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
